metadata.name: Mulligrims
metadata.description:
Mulligrims! More Grimaces.
This mod adds some simple new monster variants to the game: Mulligrims and Nest Grimaces! These Grimaces cough up flies and spiders respectively until the room is cleared! There is a limit on how many flies and spiders they can spawn, so you won't get too overwhelmed! They have a small chance to replace any other existing grimace.
Art by Ashkait and code by Scayze
